div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1514 Tel Tsippor, near Kiryat Gat, c. 10 km. W of Beth Guvrin, Judaea, 1960 Burial: after 311 B.C. (Rahmani) Contents: 63 AR Alexander III: 58 lifetime and early post. tetradr. (Amphipolis 6, Pella 1, Tarsus 1, Aradus 2, Byblus 3, Sidon 4, Ace 8, Babylon 30, Ecbatana 1, unc. mint 2) Philip III: 1 tetradr. (Sidon) Local imit. of Athens: 4 dr. Disposition: Jerusalem (Dept. of Ant.) â€ Rahmani, Eretz Israel 1966, pp. 33-8 (in Hebrew). Revised version in SM 1966, pp. 129-45, illus. Kadman, INCJ, hoard 6
